page.title: 12TRAVELS FROM PETROCKSTOWE
page.content: {52%}of the{Petrockstowe}adults have travelled{abroad,}most of them in Europe, which many have visited more than once. 6% have been to North Africa or the Middle East, 4% have crossed the Atlantic to the USA or Canada, and another 4% have been further afield, including Malaya, South Africa and India. Half the adults have travelled by ship, inclu- ding cross Channel ferries, 39% by 'plane, and 5% have been in a heli- copter. Most of this travel has been for holidays, with a very small amount a result of work or Armed Forces travel. A large proportion take regular{annual holidays abroad,}and go to both London and Exeter more than once a year. Only 44% visit Plymouth, only 15% go to Bristol. 26% of the adults have never been to London and 10% have not been to Exeter.
